title: CV Filip Mularczyk
about: I am R&D engineer working with IIoT startup.
I design and implement solutions for rotating machinery monitoring system,
where I use both condition based monitoring approach and machine learning algorithms.
I do full data stack, from data collection and cleaning to diagnostic algorithms deployment on device or cloud.
Also I have an 5+ years of experience as an automation engineer.
I was involved in design, development and commissioning of PLC & SCADA system for different areas of industry (Pulp & Paper, Marine, CHP).

strengths.name: Restorative
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the Restorative theme are adept at dealing with problems. They are good at figuring out what is wrong and resolving it.

strengths.name: Harmony
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the Harmony theme look for consensus. They don’t enjoy conflict; rather, they seek areas of agreement.

strengths.name: Consistency
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the Consistency theme are keenly aware of the need to treat people the same. They crave stable routines and clear rules and procedures that everyone can follow.

strengths.name: Learner
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the Learner theme have a great desire to learn and want to continuously improve. The process of learning, rather than the outcome, excites them.

strengths.name: Analytical
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the Analytical theme search for reasons and causes. They have the ability to think about all of the factors that might affect a situation.

history.name: Elmodis
history.title: R&D Engineer
details: Development of acquisition methods and processing algorithms of diagnostic data collected from hardware sensors.
Development of Machine Learning solutions used for machine condition monitoring. Implementation both on edge devices (Python) and on IoT Cloud (Microsoft Azure).
Design and implementation of data acquisition system used at DC Traction Motor test stand. PKP CargoTabor, Karsznice. (Labview).

history.name: Aiut
history.title: Automation Engineer
details: SCADA and DCS design and implementation for HVAC System on Oasis class cruise vessel. St. Nazaire, France. (Metso, metsoDNA).
SCADA and DCS design and implementation for batch cooking process in Pulp Mill. Tres Barras, Brazil. (Metso, metsoDNA).
SCADA and DCS design and implementation for power plant and effluent treatment plant in Paper Mill. Manchester, UK. (Metso, metsoDNA).
HMI and PLC logic design and implementation for paper winder with shaft puller in Paper Mill. Changzhou, China (Siemens, S7-300, WinCC flexible).
HMI and PLC logic design and implementation for paper sizing press. Quzhou, China. (Siemens, S7-400, WinCC flexible).
SCADA and PLC logic design and implementation for CIP station in Dairy Plant. Radomsko, Poland. (Siemens, S7-300, WinCC).
SCADA and PLC logic design and implementation for Error-Proofing system in Car Manufacturing Plant. Bochum, Germany (Siemens, S7-400, WinCC).
